metadata.description: Natty is a grifter and a con artist; and she is as wily as she is beautiful. Her marks all have one thing in common: they're criminals. Whether she's conning the con-men, ripping off the thieves, or luring the murderers to their deaths, Natty is compelled to give all of her ill gotten gains to charity. This special one-shot is dedicated to the late Doug Miers.
metadata.name: Criss Cross
